SEARCH
Package Characters

Class Bomb

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.Bomb
public class Bomb extends Character
Description:

Represents a bomb object that can be placed by the player. Bombs have a countdown timer and explode after a certain duration, affecting nearby enemies and destructible tiles.

Author:
mguzelocak, Zelele

  • Field Summary
